## Example Usage

<div><pulumi-chooser type="language" options="typescript,python,go,csharp,java,yaml"></pulumi-chooser></div>





<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="csharp">

```csharp
using System;
using System.IO;
using Pulumi;
using Tencentcloud = TencentCloudIAC.PulumiPackage.Tencentcloud;

class MyStack : Stack
{
	private static string ReadFileBase64(string path) {
		return Convert.ToBase64String(Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(File.ReadAllText(path)))
	}

    public MyStack()
    {
        var personSample = new Tencentcloud.Mps.PersonSample("personSample", new Tencentcloud.Mps.PersonSampleArgs
        {
            Usages = 
            {
                "Review.Face",
            },
            Description = "test",
            FaceContents = 
            {
                ReadFileBase64("./person.png"),
            },
        });
    }

}
```


</pulumi-choosable>
</div>


<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="go">

```go
package main

import (
	"encoding/base64"
	"io/ioutil"

	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi/sdk/v3/go/pulumi"
	"github.com/tencentcloudstack/pulumi-tencentcloud/sdk/go/tencentcloud/Mps"
)

func filebase64OrPanic(path string) pulumi.StringPtrInput {
	if fileData, err := ioutil.ReadFile(path); err == nil {
		return pulumi.String(base64.StdEncoding.EncodeToString(fileData[:]))
	} else {
		panic(err.Error())
	}
}

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		_, err := Mps.NewPersonSample(ctx, "personSample", &Mps.PersonSampleArgs{
			Usages: pulumi.StringArray{
				pulumi.String("Review.Face"),
			},
			Description: pulumi.String("test"),
			FaceContents: pulumi.StringArray{
				filebase64OrPanic("./person.png"),
			},
		})
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		return nil
	})
}
```


</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="java">

```java
package generated_program;

import java.util.*;
import java.io.*;
import java.nio.*;
import com.pulumi.*;

public class App {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        Pulumi.run(App::stack);
    }

    public static void stack(Context ctx) {
        var personSample = new PersonSample("personSample", PersonSampleArgs.builder()        
            .usages("Review.Face")
            .description("test")
            .faceContents(Base64.getEncoder().encodeToString(Files.readAllBytes(Paths.get("./person.png"))))
            .build());

    }
}
```


</pulumi-choosable>

<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="python">

```python
import pulumi
import base64
import tencentcloud_iac_pulumi as tencentcloud

person_sample = tencentcloud.mps.PersonSample("personSample",
    usages=["Review.Face"],
    description="test",
    face_contents=[(lambda path: base64.b64encode(open(path).read().encode()).decode())("./person.png")])
```


</pulumi-choosable>

```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as pulumi from "@tencentcloud_iac/pulumi";
import * from "fs";

const personSample = new tencentcloud.mps.PersonSample("personSample", {
    usages: ["Review.Face"],
    description: "test",
    faceContents: [Buffer.from(fs.readFileSync("./person.png"), 'binary').toString('base64')],
});
```

## PersonSample Resource Properties {#properties}

To learn more about resource properties and how to use them, see [Inputs and Outputs](/docs/intro/concepts/inputs-outputs) in the Architecture and Concepts docs.

### Inputs

The PersonSample resource accepts the following [input](/docs/intro/concepts/inputs-outputs) properties:



<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="csharp">
<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="usages_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#usages_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Usages</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">List&lt;string&gt;</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Material application scene, optional value:1. Recognition.Face: used for content recognition 2. Review.Face: used for inappropriate content identification 3. All: contains all of the above, equivalent to 1+2.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="description_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#description_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Description</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Material description, length limit: 1024 characters.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="facecontents_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#facecontents_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Face<wbr>Contents</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">List&lt;string&gt;</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Material image <a href="https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4648">Base64</a> encoded string only supports jpeg and png image formats. Array length limit: 5 images.Note: The picture must be a single portrait with clearer facial features, with a pixel size of not less than 200*200.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="name_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#name_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Name</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Material name, length limit: 20 characters.</p>
</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#usages_python" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">usages</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Sequence[str]</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Material application scene, optional value:1. Recognition.Face: used for content recognition 2. Review.Face: used for inappropriate content identification 3. All: contains all of the above, equivalent to 1+2.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="description_python">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#description_python" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">description</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">str</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Material description, length limit: 1024 characters.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="face_contents_python">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#face_contents_python" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">face_<wbr>contents</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Sequence[str]</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Material image <a href="https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4648">Base64</a> encoded string only supports jpeg and png image formats. Array length limit: 5 images.Note: The picture must be a single portrait with clearer facial features, with a pixel size of not less than 200*200.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="name_python">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#name_python" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">name</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">str</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Material name, length limit: 20 characters.</p>
</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

</div>

<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="javascript,typescript">
<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_description_nodejs">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_description_nodejs" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">description</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Material description, length limit: 1024 characters.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_facecontents_nodejs">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_facecontents_nodejs" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">face<wbr>Contents</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string[]</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Material image <a href="https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4648">Base64</a> encoded string only supports jpeg and png image formats. Array length limit: 5 images.Note: The picture must be a single portrait with clearer facial features, with a pixel size of not less than 200*200.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_name_nodejs">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_name_nodejs" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">name</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Material name, length limit: 20 characters.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_usages_nodejs">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_usages_nodejs" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">usages</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string[]</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>Material application scene, optional value:1. Recognition.Face: used for content recognition 2. Review.Face: used for inappropriate content identification 3. All: contains all of the above, equivalent to 1+2.</p>
</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

## Import



mps person_sample can be imported using the id, e.g.

```sh
 $ pulumi import tencentcloud:Mps/personSample:PersonSample person_sample person_sample_id
```
